metadata.description: Agent skills for non-coders: media processing and file management

plugins.name: media-skills
plugins.description: Media processing skills: download videos from YouTube and 1000+ sites, download Apple Podcasts episodes, convert PDFs to images, and generate viral video titles from subtitles

plugins.name: file-skills
plugins.description: macOS file management skills: free 100GB+ disk space with safe cleanup, organize 1000+ files with Smart Folders, convert office documents to a searchable knowledge base, and orchestrate all three in one workflow
